user_question: How can I make a vegan version of a traditional French ratatouille, and can you generate an image of the dish?
final_answer: To make a vegan version of traditional French ratatouille, use a variety of vegetables such as eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes, seasoned with herbs like thyme and basil. Image of the dish generated.
